questions_1.question: Which of the following are correct about the Main Fuel Control?
Options: Consists of two separate, semi circular halves of tubing that are attached together with B-nuts at 12 o’clock and 6 o’clock positions to form one continuous ring.
Circles the outside of the combustion chamber frame and is supported by several brackets.
Eighteen fuel injector hoses form part of the manifold.
Eight fuel injector hoses form part of the manifold.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Consists of two separate, semi circular halves of tubing that are attached together with B-nuts at 12 o’clock and 6 o’clock positions to form one continuous ring, Circles the outside of the combustion chamber frame and is supported by several brackets, Eighteen fuel injector hoses form part of the manifold."
